lead_paragraph: The unattended rental truck had wires protruding from its dashboard and gas canisters behind its seats, the police said.

headline.print_headline: Suspicious Truck Prompts Times Square Evacuation
headline.main: Suspicious Truck Prompts Evacuation in Times Square

snippet: The unattended rental truck had wires protruding from its dashboard and gas canisters behind its seats, the police said.
abstract: New York City police conduct brief evacuation of part of Time Square where unattended rental truck with protruding wires and gas canisters drew attention from city's counter-terrorism unit; all-clear is given after 40 minutes and unnamed driver remains in custody in continuing investigation.
